casebody.data:
Emma Bayles, appellant, v. John T. Cornell, respondent. Decided April 7, 1884. Appeal by plaintiff, from judgment entered upon find - ing and conclusions by judge at special term. Thomas Darlington, for appellant; F. G. McDonald, for respondent.

Before Sedgwick, Ch. J., and O’Gorman, J.

Per Curiam.

Judgment affirmed with costs.
